tweets.text:
Why the @EnvAgency are hopeless example 58,743

Anyone want to guess who has been at the very top of the EA during that whole period and who appears incapable of negotiating a proper budget settlement for the agency with government? https://t.co/B6Bmn8T9gx

We now have our panel discussion on the interaction between agricultural and environmental law.  Please welcome: 
Kath Dalmeny @sustain
Begonia Filgueira  @UKELA_LAW 
Mike Holland @AgLawUK
Peter Kellett @EnvAgency
Diane Mitchell @NFUtweets 
And our chair David Baldock @IEEP_eu https://t.co/T2gsvQpDGq

Revealed: no penalties issued under 'useless' UK farm pollution laws 

 - @EnvAgency has not prosecuted or fined any of 243 documented violations since 2018

 - EA funding fell by 63% between 2009 and 2019

https://t.co/09VvG2gnVu

Hot Drinks, Warm Clothes and Gloves essential 🥶

The @EnvAgency #FieldTeam are maintaining flood defences, responding to incidents and protecting people from flooding in the rather cold conditions.

Report #Flooding, #Blockages or #Pollution to our 24/7 #ICS on 0800 08 70 60 https://t.co/rhPuDC6BPg

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyAnglia But the regular drying up of the River Ivel in Baldock due reckless and unsustainable abstraction by @affinitywater is perfectly OK according to your water resources department. You don't appear to be a joined up organisation. @IvelRev @AquiferChalk @RiverChess @OliverHealdUK

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency This also reflects the embedded undue influence with politicians of the industrial farming lobby (think NFU) which has steered successive governments over the past 30+ years away from the deep policy changes that were needed.  It is literally, shite. @campaignstrat

🐞🐝🌼
Funded by 
@EnvAgency
#shropshire #gardendesignshropshire #landscapeconstruction #landscapecontractor #shifnal #garden #DePave #telford #shropswildlife https://t.co/R0ZjQiyoMi

tweets.text:
Albert Bartlett and Sons pay £14,000 to @N_Rivers_Trus as a result of sludge entering the River Ant in 2019.

The money will support the creation of aquatic habitats, conservation and restoration. 

Read more: https://t.co/6cZZhT9n1E #Norfolk #Pollution

Letter from @EnvAgency, 8 Feb: "With the Brent Reservoir, we maintain and clear the two trash screens ... Both of these trash screens are cleared of debris on a weekly basis" 

Oh, really? Here’s a photo. #SSSI at risk. DO SOMETHING | @NaturalEngland https://t.co/qllsWa5Bjr

tweets.text:
Why the @EnvAgency are hopeless example #58,742.

The EA have issued a consultation into water stressed areas of England. Possibly something of importance to our chalk streams. However............

https://t.co/76fWtxYPSS

Hushed up in the 90s #Capperpass since admitted their actions of dumping tonnes of contaminated over the area. The long lasting affects have been found through an @EnvAgency research project in the area, which found toxins & heavy metals. Why are they churning up the soil? 🍃💚🍃 https://t.co/40JPHufSx1

Shocking indictment of @EnvAgency . No wonder gathering storm of public outrage about polluted and exhausted rivers like the Cam and its chalk streams. @CamLabEF @camfoe @Greenpeace @greenarteries @Feargal_Sharkey @CPRECambs @CamEco_Council https://t.co/z0JZu0U5RP

tweets.text: The illegal stockpiling of #waste #tyres can present a significant risk of harm to people and the environment. If you have concerns about companies storing waste tyres, contact our incident line 0800 807060 https://t.co/AnIXCYNu8t
Last day at @DefraDigital and @EnvAgency after 6 years of testing. Thank you for being brilliant even in challenging times. Keep it accessible, open and user-focused ♻️💚

Here’s a great opportunity to shape flood and coastal erosion risk management as the chair of the Anglian Eastern Regional Flood and Coastal Committees. Interested? 
More info here:
https://t.co/ncrTvJB7r9

#Flood @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency

We love your tweets, but we're unable to pursue reports of environmental incidents online.

If you see river debris/pollution, or suspect illegal activity like waste crime or unlicensed fishing...

Please call us, free and 24 hours: 0800 807060

More here: https://t.co/6k3lpwgLOn https://t.co/6XSTnqlzQZ

Join us and experts from @burohappold @EnvAgency @suez @SMMT @WillmottDixon @Nestle on Tuesday 2 March as we launch “Fostering Prosperity” a report exploring how good regulation can drive #innovation and help us achieve #netzero ambitions. RSVP here: https://t.co/5qO4TzHkaG https://t.co/6kGCYuI9g0

The EA have issued a consultation into water stressed areas of England. Possibly something of importance to our chalk streams. However............

https://t.co/76fWtxYPSS

@NevisMacdui @WildTroutTrust @PeteTurnerEA @Claire_bithell @EnvAgencyYNE @aireriverstrust @atkypave @fishmigration @theriverstrust @RiversTrustN @AarestrupKaa @DurUni_Aqua_Lab @HyTexUKLtd @FishMigrationDr @SandTCUKYorks @NoWPaS Cheers! Now 9mo later... It looks different! And great :)
1st image is roughly same position as 2nd above. Check out the deposition bar narrowing the channel back to ~7m from 19m https://t.co/wRlmbqZOnM

This morning I met with farmers in #Lymm to see the damage to the River #Bollin flood defences following Storm Christoph now that waters have receded. Huge hole in the river bank, trees down impeding flow and blocked storm gullies needing attention by @EnvAgencyNW @johncurtinEA https://t.co/8stkc9rXsS

Today is #WomenInScienceDay2021 and I was so pleased to join a panel of inspirational @EnvAgency #women #scientists to talk about my career and the importance of #professional accreditation. #CharteredSci @CIWEM @Science_Council #WomenInScience #WomenInSTEM https://t.co/uhHGPxATn7

tweets.text:
Today is International Day of Women in Science.Join us in saying thank you to our #WomenInScience working on the front line to:

🏘️ protect homes and businesses from flooding
🌅 care for our environment
🌳 tackle climate change
 🔬detect #COVID19 in waste water https://t.co/LMX96LmzuO

tweets.text:
If a picture makes you feel better, imagine what the real thing could do. Any nature-based ideas to improve the physical health of people with SMI? 

@WYHpartnership is funding projects that help connect us to nature, improve physical & mental health & reduce health inequalities. https://t.co/OLYQgFzycu
@scroluguechamp @LoveWilko @SercoESUK @ThisIsTipton @EnvAgency @Steveredwolf @WildAboutNatur Please report this here: https://t.co/iwzQw63Bo8 Thanks.

River #pollution is a curse but it’s happening in our area. I’m really pleased that the county council is setting up a task force to look at how to make our #rivers cleaner 👇 @WindrushWasp @Feargal_Sharkey https://t.co/1WEhE5LsBW
